EmailTemplate.name: Test_BizStarter_RR_Scheduled
EmailTemplate.subject: Following up on our conversation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on taking the first steps towards starting your new business!
I hope you found your business formation consultation with Amanda Fornwalt informative and helpful. I am now working with Amanda to create your personalized Business Starter Roadmap with easy-to-follow recommendations to get your business entity up and running.
I look forward to reviewing your Roadmap with you on:
I will call you at:
If you have any questions or need to reschedule your consultation, please call me directly at (855) 787-1921 Monday–Friday from 8 a.m.–5 p.m. PT or email me anytime at BizHelp@legalzoom.com
As your dedicated account manager, I'll be your primary point of contact for all your business formation needs. My commitment to you is this—I will do whatever possible to help make sure you have the right information to make the best decisions for you—and hopefully, I can also help save you money in the process!
Thank you for reaching out to the LegalZoom Business Starter Team. I look forward to speaking with you soon.
Katherine C. Business Account Manager (855) 787-1921 BizHelp@legalzoom.com
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy.
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: $EMAIL_ADDRESS_$
